snippet.title: Emio – The Smiling Man: Famicom Detective Club – A Chat with Producer Yoshio Sakamoto
snippet.description:
Pre-order Emio – The Smiling Man: Famicom Detective Club: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/emio-the-smiling-man-famicom-detective-club-switch/?utm_source=SW-AA&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=N1139-01&utm_id=N1139-01

Series producer and writer Yoshio Sakamoto shares some insights on the creation of Emio – The Smiling Man: Famicom Detective Club, the first new entry in the series in over 30 years.

#WhoIsEmio #NintendoSwitch #FamicomDetectiveClub

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot
